mapper.select: SELECT DEP_CODE, DEP_NAME, DEP_UPDE, DEP_USE, DEP_NOTE, DEP_REGM, DEP_REGD FROM DEP WHERE DEP_CODE=#{depCode}

SELECT DEP_CODE, DEP_NAME, DEP_UPDE, DEP_USE FROM DEP WHERE 1=1
AND DEP_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND DEP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY DEP_CODE ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM DEP WHERE 1=1
AND DEP_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND DEP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
